definition: surname Mi/name of an ancient state
nature/character/property/quality/attribute/sexuality/sex/gender/suffix forming adjective from verb/suffix forming noun from adjective, corresponding to -ness or -ity/essence/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: Brant , J. Confidentiality of Medical Information. 1996.

sentences.chinese: 數據恢復和機密性問題。

sentences.english: The messages are also encrypted, assuring confidentiality.
sentences.chinese: 還對這些消息進行了加密，確保了消息的機密性。

sentences.english: Areas of concern for this tier include authentication and confidentiality services.
sentences.chinese: 這一層涉及認證和機密性服務領域。

sentences.english: Transaction confidentiality is achieved with authentication and authorization facilities.
sentences.chinese: 交易機密性通過認證和授權設施來實現。

sentences.english: One example to ensure confidentiality is to use encryption.
sentences.chinese: 確保機密性的一個例子是使用加密。

sentences.english: Doing years of top-secret engineering, too.
sentences.chinese: 同時他們也在進行着持續數年的機密性工程。
